amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase law enforcement enhancement grants by $106,850,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 212 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Weiner.
